title: Hot on Demand: Aladdin, Tomorrowland, San Andreas & More!
text:
Hot on Demand: Aladdin, Tomorrowland, San Andreas & More! Stephanie brings you what's new this week on DVD, Blu-ray, and on demand! Post to Facebook Hot on Demand: Aladdin, Tomorrowland, San Andreas & More! Stephanie brings you what's new this week on DVD, Blu-ray, and on demand! Check out this story on wtsp.com: http://on.wtsp.com/1LtUtKD Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Hot on Demand: Aladdin, Tomorrowland, San Andreas & More! 10:58 a.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Disney's Diamond edition of the animated "Aladdin" (Photo: Disney) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Looking for some date night "in" inspiration? Or maybe some family movie night choices? Here's what's new this week in "Hot on Demand": 
Disney's Aladdin - Diamond Edition (Robin Williams & Gilbert Gottfried) 
Tomorrowland (George Clooney & Britt Robertson) 
San Andreas (Dwayne Johnson)
